name: sordidly
content:
sordidly adverb
(DIRTILY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a dirty and unpleasant way: The school had a sordidly filthy interior. I wish to live simply, though not sordidly.
More examplesFewer examplesAn old woman sits mending a sordidly filthy mattress.When quite little, she ran about in rags, covered with vermin and sordidly dirty.He did not buy anything magnificent, but he did not live sordidly or too meanly.
